Function reference

Package

midfieldr midfieldr-package
midfieldr: Tools and Methods for Working with MIDFIELD Data in 'R'

Functions

add_completion_status()
Determine completion status for every student
add_data_sufficiency()
Determine data sufficiency for every student
add_timely_term()
Calculate a timely completion term for every student
filter_cip()
Subset rows that include matches to search strings
order_multiway()
Order categorical variables of multiway data
prep_fye_mice()
Prepare FYE data for multiple imputation
same_content()
Test for equal content between two data tables
select_required()
Select required midfieldr variables

Prepared data

cip
Table of academic programs
fye_proxy
Starting program proxies for FYE students
baseline_mcid
Baseline ID bloc to start a typical analysis
study_observations
Case-study observations
study_programs
Case-study program labels and codes
study_results
Case-study results

Toy data for examples

toy_course
Course data for examples
toy_degree
Degree data for examples
toy_student
Student data for examples
toy_term
Term data for examples
